authors: Orp (based on Aqua Alex, Matthew Carpenter, Roric and all other 7th ed Contributors' work)
instructions: Grey Buttons Roll Advantage/Disadvantage Dice (+-1 and +-2). Blue Buttons Roll Normal Dice. Black Buttons are used for Bouts of Madness, Commonly Used Dice Rolls, and A Body Hit Location Roll. Everything else is self-explanatory.
